item.title: rOpenSci Fellowship Application 2017
item.description: On this page you can find the answers submitted as my application to the rOpenSci fellowships program in 2017. The application was submitted on September 1st at 10:48pm. (Over nine hours before the deadline ðŸ˜‰). It was required to fit on a maximum of 3 A4 pages. You can download the PDF here. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License which means you can distribute, remix, tweak, and build upon these answers as long as you credit me for the original creation.
